about.title: About EFSTATHIOU
about.subtitle: Two decades of architectural excellence and construction innovation across Cyprus
about.description_mobile: Founded by Nicolas Efstathiou, we specialize in transforming visions into exceptional realities through meticulous craftsmanship and contemporary design.
about.description_desktop: Founded by Nicolas Efstathiou, our construction company stands at the forefront of architectural innovation in Cyprus. We specialize in transforming visions into exceptional realities through meticulous craftsmanship and contemporary design.
about.innovation_mobile: Modern design principles with traditional craftsmanship for stunning spaces.
about.innovation_desktop: We combine modern design principles with traditional craftsmanship to create spaces that are both functional and aesthetically stunning.
about.quality_mobile: Rigorous quality control ensuring perfection in every detail.
about.quality_desktop: Every project undergoes rigorous quality control processes, ensuring our clients receive nothing less than perfection in every detail.
about.partnership_description: We believe in building long-term relationships with our clients, working closely with them throughout every phase of their project.
about.cta_text: Ready to work with Cyprus's premier construction company?

hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: Two decades of architectural excellence and construction innovation across Cyprus

story.title: Our
story.subtitle: From humble beginnings to becoming Cyprus's premier construction company
story.founded_description_1: Founded by Nicolas Efstathiou in 2006, our construction company has been at the forefront of architectural innovation in Cyprus. What started as a small family business has grown into one of the most respected construction companies on the island.
story.founded_description_2: Our journey began with a simple vision: to transform the construction industry in Cyprus by combining traditional craftsmanship with modern architectural techniques. Over the years, we have built a reputation for delivering exceptional quality and innovative design solutions.
story.innovation_description: We blend contemporary design principles with traditional craftsmanship to create spaces that are both functional and aesthetically stunning.
story.quality_description: Every project undergoes rigorous quality control processes, ensuring that our clients receive nothing short of perfection in every detail.
story.partnership_description: We believe in building lasting relationships with our clients, working closely with them throughout every phase of their project.

values.title: Our
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, from initial design to final completion, ensuring the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace cutting-edge technologies and innovative design solutions to create buildings that are both beautiful and functional.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We conduct business with honesty, transparency, and ethical practices, building trust with our clients and partners.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to environmentally responsible construction practices and sustainable building solutions for a better future.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work closely with our clients, architects, and partners to ensure every project meets and exceeds expectations.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We deliver projects on time and within budget, maintaining consistent quality and service throughout every phase.

work.title: Our
work.subtitle: Explore our portfolio of exceptional projects that showcase our commitment to architectural excellence
work.portfolio_subtitle: A showcase of our completed projects across Cyprus, demonstrating our expertise and commitment to excellence
work.achievements_subtitle: Numbers that speak to our commitment to excellence and client satisfaction
work.ready_subtitle: Let's discuss your vision and create something extraordinary together

luxury_villa.title: LUXURY VILLA
luxury_villa.subtitle: Ultra-Modern Residential
luxury_villa.description: A stunning contemporary villa featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, premium finishes, and innovative architectural design that seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living.

commercial_complex.title: COMMERCIAL COMPLEX
commercial_complex.subtitle: Modern Business Architecture
commercial_complex.description: A sophisticated office building designed for modern business needs, featuring sleek lines, efficient layouts, and professional aesthetics that inspire productivity.

office_renovation_2025.title: OFFICE RENOVATION
office_renovation_2025.subtitle: Masterpiece Work Office Transformation
office_renovation_2025.description: A complete renovation project that transformed a dilapidated space into a stunning modern work office. Completed in just two months, this project showcases our expertise in renovation and interior design.

luxury_villa.title: RESIDENTIAL PROPERTY RENEWAL
luxury_villa.subtitle: Specialized Maintenance & Aesthetic Enhancement
description: Specialized maintenance and upgrade of a modern residence with focus on aesthetic improvement and preservation of architectural value. Careful exterior maintenance and contemporary enhancement that ensures long-term property value.

The scope of work encompassed detailed cleaning, repainting, and repair of exterior surfaces, along with upgrading the garden and landscape design. We also implemented modern outdoor lighting solutions and conducted thorough structural integrity checks to address any minor repairs. The goal was to blend contemporary design principles with practical maintenance, delivering a refreshed and sustainable living environment.

commercial_complex.title: METAL CONSTRUCTION HOME
commercial_complex.subtitle: Quickly Built Mountain Home
commercial_complex.description: A practical and efficiently constructed metal construction home in Mitsero, completed in just three months. This cozy retreat features a durable metal roof, spacious veranda, and a design that integrates seamlessly with its natural woodland surroundings.

office_renovation_2025.title: OFFICE RENOVATION
office_renovation_2025.subtitle: Masterpiece Work Office Transformation
office_renovation_2025.description: A complete renovation project that transformed a dilapidated space into a stunning modern work office. When we first encountered this project, it was in a state of disrepair - a complete mess that required extensive work. Through meticulous planning and expert craftsmanship, we transformed it into a masterpiece work office for our client. Completed in just two months, this project showcases our expertise in renovation and interior design, demonstrating how we can turn even the most challenging spaces into exceptional work environments.

work.cta_text: Want to see more of our exceptional work?
work.project_overview_description: Detailed insights into this exceptional project showcasing our expertise and attention to detail
work.gallery_subtitle: A visual journey through the project development and final result
work.start_discussion: Let's discuss your vision and create something extraordinary together
work.testimonial_luxury_villa: The maintenance work exceeded our expectations. The team was professional, punctual, and the results speak for themselves. Our property looks better than when we first bought it.
work.testimonial_commercial_complex: We are thrilled with our mountain retreat! The team delivered exactly what we envisioned, and the speed of construction was truly impressive.
luxury_villa_solutions: Phased work approach to minimize disruption
commercial_complex_challenges: Working with mountainous and challenging terrain
Adhering to a strict three-month timeline
commercial_complex_solutions: Efficient pre-fabrication and modular construction techniques
Streamlined project management with dedicated on-site team
Use of robust, locally sourced materials suitable for mountain conditions
office_renovation_challenges: Severe deterioration and structural issues in the original space
Tight two-month timeline for complete transformation
Coordinating multiple trades and suppliers simultaneously
Maintaining quality standards while meeting aggressive deadlines
office_renovation_solutions: Comprehensive initial assessment and strategic planning
Efficient project management with daily progress tracking
Coordinated team of skilled professionals working in parallel
Premium materials and finishes selected for durability and aesthetics
work.testimonial_office_renovation: We couldn't believe the transformation! What was once a complete mess is now a beautiful, professional work space. The team worked incredibly hard to complete this in just two months, and the quality is outstanding. We're thrilled with our new office!
work.before_description: The initial state of the space - showing the challenges we faced
work.after_description: The stunning transformation - a modern masterpiece work office

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive construction and architectural solutions crafted with precision and excellence

construction.title: Construction
construction.subtitle: From Foundation to Finish
construction.description: We specialize in comprehensive construction services, building exceptional properties from the ground up. Our team handles everything from initial planning and permits to final construction and quality assurance.

renovation.title: Renovation
renovation.subtitle: Transform Your Space
renovation.description: Breathe new life into existing properties with our comprehensive renovation services. We transform outdated spaces into modern, functional environments while preserving the character and charm of your property.

expansion.title: Expansion
expansion.subtitle: Grow Your Property
expansion.description: Expand your living or working space with our expert expansion services. Whether adding new rooms, extending existing areas, or creating additional floors, we help you maximize your property's potential.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.subtitle: Ongoing Care
maintenance.description: Professional property maintenance services to keep your buildings in optimal condition. Our maintenance team provides preventive care and prompt repairs to protect your investment.

building_excellence.title: Building Excellence Since 2006
building_excellence.description_1: Our construction services encompass every aspect of building, from initial site preparation and foundation work to final finishes and quality assurance. We handle everything from custom homes to commercial buildings, ensuring each project meets the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.
building_excellence.description_2: With over two decades of experience in Cyprus construction, we understand the unique challenges and opportunities of building in this beautiful Mediterranean environment. Our team combines traditional building techniques with modern construction methods to create structures that are both beautiful and durable.

hero.subtitle: Professional Property Maintenance - Protect Your Investment

overview.title: Property
overview.subtitle: Professional maintenance services to keep your property in optimal condition

protecting.title: Professional Property Maintenance
protecting.description_1: Our professional maintenance services address your property's specific maintenance needs with quality workmanship and attention to detail. We provide comprehensive one-time maintenance solutions including inspections, repairs, and property care to keep your investment in excellent condition.
protecting.description_2: From residential homes to commercial buildings, our experienced maintenance team handles a wide range of maintenance tasks. Whether you need a property inspection, specific repairs, or general maintenance work, we deliver professional results that protect your property value.

property_inspection.title: Property Inspection
